name: Strike.io
description:
[Game Introduction]
Players only need one finger to control the character to shoot, headshot, snipe, throw grenade. Defeat wave after wave of enemies, and get tons of loot! No time to go online to gang up? In "strike.io", you can shoot any time!

[Game Features]

◆Simple and addictive gameplay
Only one finger is required to complete operations such as shooting, dodging, and moving. Gradually unlock a variety of firearms, change a gun, and change the experience!

◆Collect massive skins
Use coins to buy gun paintings and stickers to customize the most charming guns.

【Gameplay】
1. Press and slide the screen to control the sight, aim at the enemy and then attack automatically.
2. Slide the screen to move around and dodge.
3. Unlock new weapons and get a different attack experience.
